message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I believe a price of $12,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we go with $10,250?
